name: At light speed (itch)
description:
For BTS game jam. 

No guide. No help. Your by yourself. Only two levels though. You should be fine. I hope.  Some may seem like bugs. Some may not. You are to explore. To find. 

Q; How does it fit into the theme? 

A: It is very small game but highly detailed. We ain't going to tell you more features though.
